title: Dark Fantasy/Survival Vol.1 - Music Pack
description: Music Pack designed for dark exploration, survival, horror, platforms, adventure, fantasy or open world games.
longDescription:
Music Pack designed for dark exploration, survival, horror, platforms, adventure, fantasy or open world games.


Listen here


This pack contains 79 files: full tracks, loops, variations with different intensities, ambients and jingles/stingers.


All you need for interactive game music.


(Check out Dark Fantasy/Survival Vol.2)
